about_the_game:
Office: Boss's Mystery is a humorous point-and-click adventure that combines comedy with an absurd mystery. You play as Tim, a new employee at Global Clips — a small corporation that specializes in selling paperclips. From your very first day, you realize that not everything in this office is as it seems, and what begins as a typical workday quickly turns into a laugh-filled investigation that leads you to uncover the secrets surrounding the boss.

Explore the different corners of the office, solve puzzles, engage in quirky conversations with equally quirky coworkers, and uncover the secrets hidden within the company. With diverse dialogues, surprising interactions, and an unpredictable story, every click reveals new, humorous details.

Key Features:

  • Absurd and witty storyline — a satirical take on the world of small corporations, full of humor and unexpected situations.

  • Varied dialogues and interactions — talk to characters, explore the environment, and discover new paths leading to multiple endings.

  • Charming visual style — low-poly graphics that add a touch of lightness and character to the game.

  • Atmospheric music — gentle, mood-setting melodies that perfectly complement the office's ambiance and its mysteries.

Office: Boss's Mystery is a game for everyone who appreciates humor and classic point-and-click adventures. Are you ready to solve the boss's mystery and find out what’s really behind those paperclips?
